questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to create a hyperlink?
Which attribute specifies an alternate text for an image, if the image cannot be displayed?
questions.explanation: The alt attribute provides alternate text for an image.

questions.question: Which HTML element is used for the largest heading?
Where should the <meta> tags be placed in an HTML document?
options: At the end of the file
questions.explanation: Meta tags belong inside the head element.
